dict.string: TrackMe records your GPS location to create a personal tracking history. All data stays private on your deviceâ€”nothing is shared or uploaded. Background access allows continuous tracking when the app isn't open.

TrackMe needs continuous location access to record your GPS path even when the app is in the background. Your location data is stored locally on your device only and is never transmitted to servers or third parties.
TrackMe records your GPS location to create a personal tracking history. All data is stored locally on your device and never shared with anyone.
TrackMe is a privacy-first GPS tracker that stores your location history locally on your device. No data is ever transmitted to servers or shared with third parties.
